verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: is] offering a deal to the NFL players who are protesting the national anthem during games . He says he 'll potentially pardon who they ask him to .
[ARG0: Donald Trump] is [V: offering] [ARG1: a deal to the NFL players who are protesting the national anthem during games] . He says he 'll potentially pardon who they ask him to .
Donald Trump is offering a deal to the NFL players who [V: are] protesting the national anthem during games . He says he 'll potentially pardon who they ask him to .

Donald Trump is offering a deal to [ARG0: the NFL players] [R-ARG0: who] are [V: protesting] [ARG1: the national anthem] [ARGM-TMP: during games] . He says he 'll potentially pardon who they ask him to .
Donald Trump is offering a deal to the NFL players who are protesting the national anthem during games . [ARG0: He] [V: says] [ARG1: he 'll potentially pardon who they ask him to] .
Donald Trump is offering a deal to the NFL players who are protesting the national anthem during games . He says he [V: 'll] potentially pardon who they ask him to .

Donald Trump is offering a deal to the NFL players who are protesting the national anthem during games . He says [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: 'll] [ARGM-ADV: potentially] [V: pardon] [ARG1: who they ask him to] .
Donald Trump is offering a deal to the NFL players who are protesting the national anthem during games . He says he 'll potentially pardon who [ARG0: they] [V: ask] [ARG2: him] [ARG1: to] .
